attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Legislation and legal 'patchwork' created in the last decade has caused substantial confusion to Britons, many of whom are now unable to fathom what they can and cannot legally do.

In order to both clarify and simplify one's legal position, and to better identify both criminals and offenders, every doubtful area of law should be assumed to be in favour of either the Crown or the Government – by effectivly 'banning everything'.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
